p: Visualization and statistical analysis was performed in R 3.4.3 ( R Development Core Team 2018). Values for A max and g s were set relative to Day 0. Differences in A max or g s over time in the treated plants were tested with one-way repeated measure analysis of variance (ANOVA) using the package nlme ( Pinheiro et al. 2018). Post hoc tests were performed using the multcomp package ( Hothorn et al. 2008) with Tukey’s honestly significant difference (HSD) test. Differences in water potential were assessed with a one-way ANOVA and with time as the factor. A per-time comparison t-test was then applied to test significant differences between measurements of control plants and water-stressed plants. Significant differences were assigned at P < 0.05.
